unversionedId: DSA/100 Medium/Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
id: DSA/100 Medium/Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
description: Level order traversal is a method of visiting all nodes in a binary tree level by level, from top to bottom and left to right within each level. It's also known as Breadth-First Search (BFS) for trees.
